channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Kennedy Center to close for 2 years for construction in July, Trump says
item.description: President Trump says he will move to close Washington's Kennedy Center for two years. It follows a wave of cancellations since Trump ousted the previo...

item.title: What to know about Artemis II's 'wet dress rehearsal'
item.description: As astronauts prepare to fly around the moon, critical testing must occur before there is "Go" for launch.

item.title: Kennedy Center to close for two years for renovations, Trump says
item.description: The move follows several artists cancelling performances at the storied institution after it was recently renamed as the Trump Kennedy Center.

item.title: 1/28: The Takeout with Major Garrett
item.description: Government report says two agents fired weapons during Alex Pretti shooting; 85-year-old Congressman Jim Clyburn expected to run for reelection

item.title: Stars hit red carpet at Grammy Awards show
item.description: A collection of some of the best looks from Sunday's awards in Los Angeles.

item.title: ICE halts "all movement" at Texas detention facility due to measles infections
item.description: The measles​ cases at the Dilley Immigration Processing Center were detected Friday, Department of Homeland Security spokesperson Tricia McLaughlin sa...

item.title: Three West African juntas have turned to Russia. Now the US wants to engage them
item.description: The US signals that restoring democracy is no longer a priority and it is ready to work with Burkina Faso, Mali and Niger.

item.title: Bad Bunny declares 'ICE out' as he wins Grammy
item.description: The Puerto Rican star gets political, as he's tipped to win the main prize, album of the year.

item.title: Syria's only female minister pushes for change: 'I'm not here for window dressing'
item.description: The BBC's Lyse Doucet follows Hind Kabawat as she confronts the challenges of fragmented, post-Assad Syria.

item.title: Kennedy Center to close for construction for 2 years, Trump says
item.description: Complete closure of the performing arts center in Washington, D.C., will start on July 4, Mr. Trump said in a social media post.

item.title: Powerful storm hits an East Coast still buried under last week's snow

item.title: Grammy Awards winners list for 2026: Live updates
item.description: The 2026 Grammy Awards are recognizing the best of the best in music from last year. Here's the full list of winners and nominees.

item.title: Swiss Alpine bar fire claims 41st victim, an 18-year-old Swiss national

item.title: Bomb cyclone brings bitter cold and snow to the Southeast
item.description: Temperatures in southern Florida reached the coldest they've been since 1989, according to the National Weather Service.

item.title: Alcaraz beats Djokovic to become the youngest man to complete a career Grand Slam
